abstract: Britain's Channel 4 News has obtained video said to have been recorded secretly in a military hospital in the Syrian city of Homs, showing patients shackled to their beds and bearing marks consistent with reports of torture at state-run medical facilities.

headline.main: Syrian Whistleblower Says Detainees Were Tortured in Military Hospital
